headline: Jim Cramer Reasserts That Tesla, Inc. (TSLA) Is An Autonomous Driving & Robotics Stock
summary: We recently published 10 Stocks Jim Cramer Discussed As He Remained Optimistic About American Ingenuity. Tesla, Inc. (NASDAQ:TSLA) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer recently discussed. Cramer’s co-host David Faber managed to squeeze in Tesla, Inc. (NASDAQ:TSLA) at the show’s end. Faber was surprised by the shares rising by 4% as the show ended […]
